title: No me olvides - SamCrevellari - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1 (Maybe. Or maybe not)

Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia

Rating: K

Pairing/s: Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto

Tags: Fluff, Romance.

Language: Spanish.

Summary: AU. Who doesn’t dream in this world? At least, at some point of our lifes, we all have dreamt about something. But, one in particular left a permanent mark in the mind of Izuku Midoriya.

Comments: My first oneshot for this pairing! I love them? They are so fluffy? Also, @an-bouwer posted a prompt too beautiful to ignore, so it’s her fault.

blog.name: allmightfanboy25
blog.title: Plus Ultra!
blog.description: Hi! I’m Izuku Midoriya, and my hero name is Deku! I’m 16 years old and currently a 1st year at UA! Thanks for stopping by!! (RP blog feel free to interact!)

body:
Soulmate AU (Closed)

@cielafrombb

It first happened when he was 4. It was a normal summer day. He, Kacchan, and their other friends were walking through the woods, playing “Bakugou’s Explorers”. He was lagging behind, not able to keep up the the group, when suddenly he felt a swift pain in his stomach, as if somebody had just kicked him.


He cried out in pain and surprise, and fell to the ground. The others noticed the cry and turned around to see what had happened.


“Oi! Deku! What do you think you’re doing?”


“I-I’m sorry Kacchan, I just…my chest just started hurting for some reason, I don’t k-know what happened!” he said as tears started overflowing out of his eyes. One of the other boys stepped forward.


“My mom said that if that happens it could be your soulmate” he said the word soulmate as if he had no idea what it meant. “she said that soulmates feel each other’s hurt.”


“Hah? As if shitty Deku even has a soulmate!” Kacchan shouted, his eyes suddenly burning with rage. “He’s just being stupid!” he said, as he swiftly yanked Izuku’s arm to get him up from the ground. Izuku sniffled, and tried to ignore the lingering ache as he continued to follow behind the rest of the boys again.

blog.name: imaginemyhero
blog.title: Your Hero
blog.description: Become your best self along side your favorite heroes! Requests are OPEN!!

summary: Imagine walking into class that first day of school and being nervous. You didn’t know anyone at UA, and considering it’s the...
body:
Imagine walking into class that first day of school and being nervous. You didn’t know anyone at UA, and considering it’s the top hero school, you expected everyone to be tough as nails.

To your surprise, all the girls immediately gravitate to each other. It’s so much more laid back then you imagined. A girl with pink skin introduces herself, a frog-like girl says it’s nice to meet you. All the girls talk a moment and your worries are put to rest.
